name: Lunar Mission
description:
LUNAR MISSION

You exist on the frontiers of unknown space and have accepted a dangerous mission...

You must safely land your craft on the surface on an alien moon. Make it to the landing pad before your fuel runs out or you'll plummet to the rocks below in a fiery crash.

CONTROLS

X - Start the game

Left, Right, Down - Blast jet, pushing the craft in a direction

Thanks for playing!! This is the first game developed by Bellwether Games in PICO-8 and we are proud to present it!
